00086 BOOLEAN EnterFlorist()
00087 {
00088   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00089 
00090       SetBookMark( FLORIST_BOOKMARK );
00091       
00092       InitFloristDefaults();
00093 
00094       // load the handbullet graphic and add it
00095       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00096       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\HandBullet.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00097       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiHandBullet));
00098 
00099       guiGalleryButtonImage   = LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\FloristButtons.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00100 
00101       guiGalleryButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiGalleryButtonImage, sFloristText[FLORIST_GALLERY], FLORIST_BUTTON_TEXT_FONT, 
00102                                                                                FLORIST_BUTTON_TEXT_UP_COLOR, FLORIST_BUTTON_TEXT_SHADOW_COLOR, 
00103                                                                                FLORIST_BUTTON_TEXT_DOWN_COLOR, FLORIST_BUTTON_TEXT_SHADOW_COLOR, 
00104                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00105                                                                                FLORIST_GALLERY_BUTTON_X, FLORIST_GALLERY_BUTTON_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00106                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnGalleryButtonCallback);
00107       SetButtonCursor(guiGalleryButton, CURSOR_WWW );
00108 
00109       //reset the currently selected card
00110       gbCurrentlySelectedCard = -1;
00111 
00112       //Initialize the Florsit Order Page (reset some variables)
00113       InitFloristOrderForm();
00114 
00115       //Initialize the flower index for the gallery page
00116       gubCurFlowerIndex = 0;
00117 
00118 
00119       RenderFlorist();
00120       fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
00121 
00122       //set some variables for the order form
00123       InitFloristOrderFormVariables();
00124 
00125       return(TRUE);
00126 }

00128 void ExitFlorist()
00129 {
00130       
00131       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiHandBullet);
00132 
00133       RemoveFloristDefaults();
00134 
00135       UnloadButtonImage( guiGalleryButtonImage );
00136 
00137       RemoveButton( guiGalleryButton );
00138 }

00144 void RenderFlorist()
00145 {
00146   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00147       UINT16 i, usPosY;
00148       UINT8 ubTextCounter;
00149 
00150       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiHandBullet);
00151 
00152       DisplayFloristDefaults();
00153 
00154       //compnay info
00155       DisplayWrappedString(FLORIST_COMPANY_INFO_TEXT_X, FLORIST_COMPANY_INFO_LINE_1_Y, FLORIST_COMPANY_INFO_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, FLORIST_SENTENCE_FONT, FLORIST_SENTENCE_COLOR,  sFloristText[ FLORIST_DROP_ANYWHERE ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00156       DisplayWrappedString(FLORIST_COMPANY_INFO_TEXT_X, FLORIST_COMPANY_INFO_LINE_2_Y, FLORIST_COMPANY_INFO_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, FLORIST_SENTENCE_FONT, FLORIST_SENTENCE_COLOR,  sFloristText[ FLORIST_PHONE_NUMBER ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00157       DisplayWrappedString(FLORIST_COMPANY_INFO_TEXT_X, FLORIST_COMPANY_INFO_LINE_3_Y, FLORIST_COMPANY_INFO_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, FLORIST_SENTENCE_FONT, FLORIST_SENTENCE_COLOR,  sFloristText[ FLORIST_STREET_ADDRESS ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00158       DisplayWrappedString(FLORIST_COMPANY_INFO_TEXT_X, FLORIST_COMPANY_INFO_LINE_4_Y, FLORIST_COMPANY_INFO_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, FLORIST_SENTENCE_FONT, FLORIST_SENTENCE_COLOR,  sFloristText[ FLORIST_WWW_ADDRESS ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00159 
00160 
00161       usPosY = FLORIST_FIRST_BULLET_Y;
00162       ubTextCounter = FLORIST_ADVERTISEMENT_1;
00163       for( i=0; i<FLORIST_NUMBER_OF_BULLETS; i++)
00164       {
00165             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, FLORIST_FIRST_BULLET_X, usPosY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00166 
00167             DisplayWrappedString(FLORIST_FIRST_SENTENCE_COLUMN_TEXT_X, (UINT16)(usPosY+20), FLORIST_FIRST_SENTENCE_COLUMN_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, FLORIST_SENTENCE_FONT, FLORIST_SENTENCE_COLOR,  sFloristText[ubTextCounter], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00168             ubTextCounter++;
00169 
00170             DisplayWrappedString(FLORIST_SECOND_SENTENCE_COLUMN_TEXT_X, (UINT16)(usPosY+15), FLORIST_SECOND_SENTENCE_COLUMN_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, FLORIST_SENTENCE_FONT, FLORIST_SENTENCE_COLOR,  sFloristText[ubTextCounter], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00171             ubTextCounter++;
00172 
00173             usPosY += FLORIST_BULLET_OFFSET_Y;
00174       }
00175 
00176   MarkButtonsDirty( );
00177       RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00178   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y);
00179 }
00180 
00181 
00182 BOOLEAN InitFloristDefaults()
00183 {
00184   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00185 
00186       // load the Florist background graphic and add it
00187       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00188       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\leafback.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00189       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiFloristBackground));
00190 
00191       //if its the first page
00192       if( guiCurrentLaptopMode == LAPTOP_MODE_FLORIST )
00193       {
00194             // load the small title graphic and add it
00195             VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00196             GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_LARGEFLORISTSYMBOL );
00197             CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiLargeTitleSymbol));
00198       }
00199       else
00200       {
00201             // load the leaf back graphic and add it
00202             VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00203             GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_SMALLFLORISTSYMBOL );
00204             CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiSmallTitleSymbol));
00205 
00206 
00207             //flower title homepage link
00208             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedFloristTitleHomeLinkRegion, FLORIST_SMALL_TITLE_X, FLORIST_SMALL_TITLE_Y, (UINT16)(FLORIST_SMALL_TITLE_X + FLORIST_SMALL_TITLE_WIDTH), (UINT16)(FLORIST_SMALL_TITLE_Y + FLORIST_SMALL_TITLE_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00209                                      CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectFloristTitleHomeLinkRegionCallBack ); 
00210             MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedFloristTitleHomeLinkRegion); 
00211       }
00212 
00213       return(TRUE);
00214 }
00215 
00216 void DisplayFloristDefaults()
00217 {
00218   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00219 
00220       WebPageTileBackground(4, 4, FLORIST_BACKGROUND_WIDTH, FLORIST_BACKGROUND_HEIGHT, guiFloristBackground);
00221 
00222       //if its the first page
00223       if( guiCurrentLaptopMode == LAPTOP_MODE_FLORIST )
00224       {
00225             gfHomePageActive = TRUE;            
00226             GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiLargeTitleSymbol);
00227             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,FLORIST_BIG_TITLE_X, FLORIST_BIG_TITLE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00228       }
00229       else
00230       {
00231             gfHomePageActive = FALSE;           
00232             GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiSmallTitleSymbol);
00233             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,FLORIST_SMALL_TITLE_X, FLORIST_SMALL_TITLE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00234       }
00235 }
00236 
00237 void RemoveFloristDefaults()
00238 {
00239       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiFloristBackground );
00240 
00241       //if its the first page
00242       if( gfHomePageActive )
00243       {
00244             //delete the big title
00245             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiLargeTitleSymbol );
00246       }
00247       else
00248       {
00249             //delete the little title
00250             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSmallTitleSymbol );
00251 
00252             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedFloristTitleHomeLinkRegion );
00253       }
00254 }

00257 
00258 void BtnGalleryButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00259 {
00260       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00261       {
00262             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00263             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00264       }
00265       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00266       {
00267             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00268             {
00269                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00270 
00271                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_FLORIST_FLOWER_GALLERY;
00272 
00273                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00274             }
00275       }
00276       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00277       {
00278             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00279             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00280       }
00281 } 
00282 
00283 void SelectFloristTitleHomeLinkRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00284 { 
00285       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00286       {
00287       }
00288       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00289       {
00290             guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_FLORIST;
00291       }
00292       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00293       {
00294       } 
00295 }
